Scriptal.Name: Update Demon Points
Scriptal.Description: Adds or removes Demon (Ogre) Points from the player, the hidden morality value to grow Snake's horn. A negative number will subtract Demon Points, shrinking Snake's horn.
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: local tempPrintOgreNotif = "" if |[1|NUMBER]| > 0 then TppMotherBaseManagement.AddOgrePoint( { ogrePoint = |[1|NUMBER]| } ) tempPrintOgreNotif = |[2|STRING]| .. " [Demon Points +" .. |[1|NUMBER]| .. "]" else TppMotherBaseManagement.SubOgrePoint( { ogrePoint = math.abs(|[1|NUMBER]|) } ) tempPrintOgreNotif = |[2|STRING]| .. " [Demon Points " .. |[1|NUMBER]| .. "]" end if |[2|STRING]| ~= "" then InfCore.DebugPrint(tempPrintOgreNotif) end

Choice.Name: Demon Value
Choice.Description: The amount of Demon Points to be granted to the player. Set to a negative number to subtract Demon Points. For perspective, fultoning a hostage is -60 Demon Points in the base game. Killing a hostage is +100 Points. Read more on Demon point calculation here: https://metalgear.fandom.com/wiki/Demon_Points

Choice.Name: Notification Message
Choice.Description: Displays a notification to announce that Demon Points have been added or removed. Automatically appends [Demon Points <Demon Value>] to the end. The base game does not notify the player of Demon point values. Leave empty to add/remove Demon Points without a notification.
